parameters.name: predicate
parameters.suggested_values: constrain connections according to a predicate

parameters.name: biolink_class
parameters.suggested_values: constrain connections according to a Biolink class

parameters.name: id
parameters.suggested_values: constrain connections by an object id (curie)

parameters.name: name_source
parameters.suggested_values: restrict names to a given source

parameters.name: element_attribute
parameters.suggested_values: restrict element attributes to a given type

parameters.name: connection_attribute
parameters.suggested_values: restrict connection attributes to a given type

parameters.name: limit
parameters.suggested_values: maximum number of connected elements per source transformer, 0 if no maximum
